participant_1.background:
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonald.
I am not married, but I do enjoy online shopping and collecting memories from my vacations.
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
i am colour blind.

I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
i love to play league of legends.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i m getting married.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I bake a lot and play a lot of League of Legends.
Wow, that's cool! I love to read, write, and spend time in nature.
That's awesome! I wish I could spend more time in nature, but I live in the city.
I know what you mean, I'm not far from the city either.
Do you like to go camping or hiking?
I love to go hiking, but I'm not a huge fan of camping.
I'm the opposite, I love camping but I'm not a huge fan of hiking.
That's funny, I guess we're opposites!
I guess so! What's your favorite thing to do while you're camping?
I love to roast marshmallows over the campfire and tell stories.
That sounds really nice! I like to sit around the campfire and stargaze.
That's awesome! I haven't done that in a long time.
You should try it sometime, it's really relaxing.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion
